code: import React from'react';import{Quote,Star}from'lucide-react';import{testimonials}from'./testimonials';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Testimonials=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"testimonials",className:"testimonials",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"section-badge section-badge-accent",children:"Testimonials"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Travelers Love Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Hear from fellow explorers who discovered Chittagong's beauty with Globetrotter"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"testimonials-grid",children:testimonials.map((testimonial,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Quote,{className:"quote-icon",size:32}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"testimonial-rating",children:Array(testimonial.rating).fill(0).map((_,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Star,{size:16,fill:"currentColor"},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"testimonial-text",children:testimonial.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial-author",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"author-avatar",children:testimonial.avatar}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"author-name",children:testimonial.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"author-role",children:testimonial.role})]})]})]},index))})]})});};export default Testimonials;
